definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be ashamed (Sab. [[בוס]]; [[מהבאס]] = evil-doer DHM:ZMG 1883, 375, ‖ Aram. [[בְּהַת]], Syr. bheyt; Ar. ba03a, ba3=a mean disperse)—

abs. feel shame Je 6:15 + 16 t., Is 19:9, Is 23:4, Is 37:27, Is:Is 2 Is 45:16 + 14 t., Ez Eze 16:63, Mic 7:16, Joe 2:26, Joe 2:27, 2Ki 19:26, Ez Eze 9:6, Job 6:20, Ps 6:11 (+ 27 t., chiefly in late Psalms).
sq. [[מִן]], be ashamed of, i.e. disconcerted, disappointed by reason of Je 2:36, Je 2:36, Je 12:13, Je 48:13, Is 1:29, Is 20:5, Ez Eze 32:30, Eze 36:32.

with obj. [[בּשְׁתִּי לִשְׁאוֹל]] I am ashamed to ask Ez 8:22; [[לאׁ]] [[תֵבשׁוּ תַּהְכְּרוּ לִי]] ye are not ashamed to deal hardly with me (impf. subj.) Job 19:3. [[בּושׁ]] often ‖[[נכלם]] & [[חפר]]; [[בּשׁוּ וְהָכְלְמוּ]] they are ashamed and confounded Je 14:3, Je 22:22, Is:Is 2 Is 41:11, Is 45:16, Is 45:17, Ez Eze 16:52, Eze 36:32, Ps 35:4, Ps 69:7, Ez Eze 9:6; [[וּבשׁוּ הַחׂזִים וְחָֽפְרוּ הַקּׂסְמִים]] and the seers shall be ashamed and the diviners confounded Mic 3:7, cf. Je 15:9, Job 6:20, Ps 35:26, Ps 40:15, Ps 70:3, Ps 71:24; [[יֵבוֹשׁ]] [[מְקוֹרוֹ]] Ho 13:15 (rd. [[יִיבַשׁ]] be dry); [[עַד־בּוֹשׁ]] † Ju Jdg 3:25, 2Ki 2:17, 2Ki 8:11.

definitions.title: Polel
definitions.body: Pf. [[בּשֵׁשׁ]] delay (in shame), [[בּשֵׁשׁ משֶׁה לָרֶדֶת]] Moses delayed to descend Ex 32:1 (J), [[מַדּוּעַ בּשֵׁשׁ רִכְבּוֹ לָבוֹא]] why delay his chariots to come ? Ju Jdg 5:28.

definitions.title: Hiph. 1.
definitions.body: [[הֱבִישׁוֹתָ]] Ps 44:8; [[הֱבִישׁׂתָה]] Ps 53:6; Impf. 2 ms. sf. [[תְּבִישֵׁנִי]] Ps 119:31, Ps 119:116; [[תָּבִישׁוּ]] Ps 14:6; put to shame, Pt. [[מֵבִישׁ]] Pr 10:5, Pr 14:35, Pr 19:26, Pr 29:15; one causing shame or acting shamefully, ‖[[מִשְׂכִּיל]]; [[עֶבֶד מַשְׂכִּיל יִמְשׁׂל בְּבֵן מֵבִישׁ]] a servant acting wisely will rule over a son causing shame Pr 17:2; [[מְבִישָׁה]] ‖[[אֵשֶׁת חַיִל ]] Pr 12:4.

[[הוֹבִישׁ]] 2Sa 19:6, Je 2:26, Je 6:15, Joe 1:10, Joe 1:12; [[הׂבִישׁ]] Je 10:14 + 7 t., Ho 2:7, Joe 1:12, Joe 1:17, Is 30:5 (but [[הבאיש]] Kt); [[הׂבִשׁוּ]] Je 8:9; Je 8:12; Imv. [[הׂבִישׁוּ]] Joe 1:11 (all the forms in Joel derived √ [[יׇבֵשׁ]] by ancient versions and some moderns, vid. Ew:§ 122 e Ges:§ 72, 6).

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יִתְבּשָָׁשׁוּ]] ashamed before one another Ge 2:25 (J).
